content: build.fhir.org has been terribly slow for me last couple of days. Sometimes pages don't load at all, sometimes they load half, then it's fast again. Downloads I have to retry several times till they succeed. 1.6.0 and the rest of the Web is fast enough. Anybody else experiencing this?
Yes, during my training course this Wednesday I also couldn't load pages. Fortunately the official build also had the information I wanted to show. Haven't tried since.
OK, thanks. I'll use 1.6.0 then for the time being.
I've had similar issues -- it is either slow or fails to load. I heard others say the same thing, too.
I now sometimes get a 502: BAD GATEWAY
Yeah, we've been having various issues with this server. I think @Grahame Grieve is going to try to provision a new server in AWS that should have better connectivity.
